name: agent-routing
description: Tests for agent routing based on prompt keywords

tests.name: bug keywords route to bug-whisperer
tests.prompt: fix this bug in the authentication code

tests.name: security keywords route to security-auditor
tests.prompt: audit this code for security vulnerabilities

tests.name: test keywords route to test-writer-fixer
tests.prompt: write unit tests for this function

tests.name: review keywords route to code-reviewer
tests.prompt: review this pull request for best practices

tests.name: prototype keywords route to rapid-prototyper
tests.prompt: quickly build a prototype for this feature

tests.name: deploy keywords route to devops-automator
tests.prompt: set up CI/CD pipeline for deployment

tests.name: UI keywords route to ui-designer
tests.prompt: design the user interface for this feature

tests.name: lint keywords route to code-reviewer
tests.prompt: fix the eslint errors and clean up the code

tests.name: cleanup keywords route to refactoring-expert
tests.prompt: cleanup this messy code and remove dead code
